author: Ubisoft
description:
Welcome to Albion, Governor! 
Discover these mysterious Celtic wetlands, where no civilized Roman wants to be. From architectural styles to which deities to worship, the degree to which you Romanize your provinces is up to you. Will you embrace local Celtic culture or impose Roman traditions? The fate of this region—and your legacy—is yours to decide.

Anno 117: Pax Romana is available November 13, 2025 📜

Pre-order now 👉 https://ubi.li/2JXoZ
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3274580/Anno_117_Pax_Romana/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/anno-117-pax-romana/9NFMQ8MP7353/0017
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/anno-117-pax-romana
PS: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011009

title: Anno 117: Pax Romana - Official Albion Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
Get a first look at TOM CLANCY'S SPLINTER CELL: DEATHWATCH, a new animated series from Netflix and Ubisoft Film & Television coming soon.

Liev Schreiber is legendary agent Sam Fisher. From Derek Kolstad, the writer behind the John Wick franchise, comes the first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game franchise, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell.

About Ubisoft Film & Television:

Ubisoft Film & Television’s mission is to bring Ubisoft’s award-winning games into new areas of entertainment and to create original stories set in the world, culture, and community of gaming. All four seasons of the division’s first original series, Mythic Quest, and spin-off anthology series Side Quest are available to stream globally on Apple TV+. The highly anticipated Splinter Cell: Deathwatch animated series will be available in 2025 on Netflix. Previous releases include the independently produced feature film Werewolves Within (IFC Films), and animated series’ Rabbids Invasion (Netflix) and Capt
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch | Official Announcement | Geeked Week '24 | Netflix

author: Ubisoft
description:
Surprise!

The Rogue Prince of Persia is out now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Coming later this year to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2! It’s time to rewrite fate, save Persia… or die trying.
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia - Launch Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description: ❌ Automatic weapons on defense will no longer have access to magnified scopes.
title: 🎲 Operation High Stakes is bringing a change to defender sights.
